article_title: Bernard Schoenburg: Flynn hopes to block LaHood 'coronation' in 18th

article_metadata.description:
Could the DARIN LaHOOD train be derailed?
It seems unlikely, but MIKE FLYNN, one of two other Republicans in the running for their party's nomination for the 18th Congressional District seat from which AARON SCHOCK resigned, sure hopes so.
Flynn is a Quincy native who founded the website biggovernment.com with ANDREW BREITBART, and he said in a recent interview that there should not be a "coronation" to fill the Schock vacancy.
LaHood, a state senator from Dunlap, has had endorsements and money
article_metadata.author: Bernard Schoenburg, Political Writer
